product_name: WTB Weirwolf LT 29er Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.3
long_description: WTB WeirWolf LT 29er folding mountain bike tire is tubeless-compatible and offers versatile trail traction for your cross-country and all-mountain stoke sessions. Tubeless-ready design (requires sealant, sold separately) features a 60 tpi casing with folding, UST-compatible aramid bead. WTB fast-rolling DNA rubber compound is formulated for high-performance riding; dual-density construction optimizes grip and wear along shoulders and crown. Transitional tread between crown and shoulders enables consistent traction and feel at any lean angle, from moderate to extreme. Terraced side knobs offer responsive traction through turns, responding to terrain to ensure firm grip when it's needed. WTB WeirWolf LT 29er folding mountain bike tire works well for cross-country or all-mountain use on dry to damp, hardpack to loamy trails.
short_description: WTB WeirWolf LT 29er folding mountain bike tire is tubeless-compatible and offers versatile trail traction for your cross-country and all-mountain stoke sessions.
